preface.title: Welcome to the LFS Editor's Manual
preface.para: This manual will teach you all that you need to know in order to properly edit the LFS-Book. It will cover some basic issues like accessing CVS over SSH and the CVS commands you will be used. It will also discuss the proper sequence of doing things like upgrading a package (both in the book as well as the FTP server) and how to work with the bug tracking database.
